column4: Hi! I'm looking for a system monitor for Ubuntu, which may look like some form of desklet
seen conky ?
No, I found something called torsmo. Have you heard of it?
nope
Do you use conky?
i don't use any system monitor except gnome panel applets to watch some system temperatures
but i've used conky in the past
apparently torsmo isn't maintained anymore...conky is the new torsmo..kinda.
ok
Is it possible to fetch it to the desktop, so it would be like "eye-candy" ? :)
i don't understand what you mean.
Live statistics about the system temp etc directly as graphs on the Desktop in X
well..that sounds like conky. :)
http://tbn0.google.com/images?q=tbn:fObcjqLr2xDakM:http://hacks-galore.org/jao/journal/images/conky.png
isn't that eyecandy enough?
kinda tiny pic on that link :P
anyhow, I think this is good enough :)
oh..sorry..must've been wrong link
check that out: http://hacks-galore.org/jao/journal/images/conky.png :)
Geniack: that's what I had in mind
Geniack: sprry
That's what I had in mind
